description: Harley-Davidson Women's RWB Bar & Shield Short Sleeve Tee - White, 30298782. Part of the Red, White & Blue Collection. This all cotton tee is decked out with a time-less patriotic Bar & Shield logo screen printed on front. Back features our Wisconsin Harley-Davidson Dealer logo in patriotic colors. Extremely soft and light-weight, made of 100% cotton. Classic fit White short sleeve tee. Attractive round neck. Show your patriotism and your love of Harley with this t-shirt. 30298782.
